snippet.title: The Time I Have Left - Exclusive Official Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: In The Time I Have Left, you have just six hours to live. Guide Aline in a race against the clock through an underground facility in this time-driven escape adventure with RPG elements. Take on disturbing visions of death in turn-based combat, and navigate a mysterious and haunting world as you uncover a compelling story that revolves around life, death, and the memories that shape us. The Time I Have Left will be released in 2024.
